rooms.name: Main Hall
rooms.description: Where I woke up. There's a massive sign on the wall with it's name

npcs.name: Spirit Of Zeus
npcs.greeting: Hello there, wanderer. I see you finally awaken from your slumber. Ready yourself, soon Odin will return to serve his punishment
npcs.standard_response: Odin creeps ever closer. Your time here is limited. I hope this doesn't come as a 'shock' to you. Mwuahahah
npcs.excessive_response: STOP annoying me with your small talk! Do you require anything from me?
npcs.has_item_response: Wait. No. Could it be? How did you find this? Give it here, quickly.
npcs.complete_response: If you find any other stones... maybe we will be lenient when Odin arrives
npcs.incorrect_item_response: Why are you giving me this? Ugh, stop wasting my time. Odin will strike swiftly, once he arrives

npcs.name: Spirit Of Freya
npcs.greeting: Greetings, my child. My deepest sympothies about your situation. I wish I could do something to help, but Odin arrives soon.
npcs.standard_response: I hope that you can find peace with yourself in your final hours. Your situation is a complicated one
npcs.excessive_response: Please stop begging me. There is nothing more I can do for you.
npcs.has_item_response: Oh my... How did you get this?! Please hand it over. I hope for your sake that there are more for you to find
npcs.complete_response: Have a look around. Zeus & Baulder could be persuaded if you could do the same for them

npcs.name: Spirit Of Baulder
npcs.greeting: Well, well, well. The little brat is finally awake. What's the matter? Scared of Odin's punishment? Hah, you should be. May the guardian light shine through your final hours
npcs.standard_response: Whatd'ya want? Come to grovel to me? It 'aint gonna work.
npcs.excessive_response: Look, you 'aint getting any help from me. Go be annoying somewhere else.
npcs.incorrect_item_response: Is this meant to impress me? Well congratulations... *clap* *clap* *clap* - it didn't.

rooms.name: North Hallway
rooms.description: A long hallway that leads down one side of the facility

items.name: Luden Statue
items.description: Aww, isn't he a cute lil' guy

items.name: Glass Shard
items.description: I should be careful with this. Don't wanna do more harm

rooms.name: East Hallway
rooms.description: Hallway that takes me to the back of the complex. Seems very dark down here

items.name: Blank Paper
items.description: A blank piece of paper, could be useful with a pen

rooms.name: MI034
rooms.description: A quiet little room near the side of the facility with a ghost. Wonder how he got here...

items.name: Computer Mouse
items.description: A computer mouse, used for controlling a PC

items.name: Broken Headset
items.description: Just a broken headset. Nothing special here

npcs.name: Ghost of VR
npcs.greeting: Greetings wanderer. What brings you along my path? Is it the promise of loot or to free me from this cursed room?
npcs.standard_response: Please, wanderer. I have been here for 500 years now. My death is the only thing that bounds me to the realm. Can you help free me?
npcs.excessive_response: Do you wish to torture me by returning so often? Help me or leave me be.
npcs.has_item_response: Ah, finally! Now I may rest in peace. I am eternally greateful. Thank you. And here, take this I found lying around
npcs.complete_response: You have served me well. Now go, let me play VR.
npcs.incorrect_item_response: What is this? Don't waste my time with irrelevent things.

reward_item.name: Light Stone
reward_item.description: A special stone, encased with protective casing to contain a bright, glowing light inside

rooms.name: MI035
rooms.description: There's hardly any light in here but I can just about make out a couple things.

items.name: Vive Controller
items.description: A VR controller. Could be useful to someone who has one missing

items.name: Ominous Candle
items.description: Not sure how a candle can be ominous but, here we are.

rooms.name: Staircase
rooms.description: A crumbling staircase that leads upstairs. It might contain more rooms to check out

items.name: Small rock
items.description: It's an even smaller rock. Even less special

items.name: Stone
items.description: It's a rock, nothing special

rooms.name: F1 Landing
rooms.description: A massive open space, full of old and rusted parts. From here I can see three room, all look abandoned and filled with broken glass

items.name: Lantern
items.description: Good for lighting the way.

items.name: Electrical Parts
items.description: So many broken parts. Maybe these could be useful?

items.name: Empty Water Bottle
items.description: A water bottle, but nothing is inside.

rooms.name: F1 North Hallway
rooms.description: Another hallway that leads to more dark places

items.name: Splint
items.description: Useless

rooms.name: F1 East Hallway
rooms.description: An almost enclosed space with complete darkness at the other end. However, there seems to be a head down there...

items.name: Shard of the Unknown
items.description: A very creepy shard

items.name: Empty Mug
items.description: Just an big empty mug with a logo on the side saying 'Sports Direct'

items.name: Â£5 Note
items.description: A note. Seems like it's of a foreign currency. Never seen one of these before

npcs.name: Abandoned Head
npcs.greeting: Ahh, nice to meet ya, fellow prisoner. NIce to see another prisoner come through. Trut me, I've been stuck here for a while now and seen plenty o' fellows. Maybe you can help me?
npcs.standard_response: If I were you, I'd see about convincing them spirits to let you out. I have a stone which might help you! Just find me a torch or something...
npcs.excessive_response: I'm just a head. Stop asking me questions! You might have a body still but are you sure you have a brain?
npcs.has_item_response: Thank you! In return, take this. I thought it could light up the path but to no avail.
npcs.complete_response: You have served me well. Now go, let me play VR.
npcs.incorrect_item_response: What am I gonna do with this. I can barely see it!

reward_item.name: Lightning Stone
reward_item.description: A special stone, filled with lightning. I should hold onto this...

rooms.name: F1 West Hallway
rooms.description: Another hallway. A wall of rolling cloud fills the end of the hallway. Seems impassable

rooms.name: MI102a
rooms.description: A very open room, again filled with loads of broken electrical parts

items.name: Earth Stone
items.description: A special stone, infused with the elements of a far away planet.

items.name: Electrical Parts
items.description: More useless electrical parts

rooms.name: MI102b
rooms.description: You only just manage to get into the room. There's just so much junk in here it's hard to find anything useful

items.name: Chair
items.description: A chair that used for sitting on

items.name: Overgrown Plant
items.description: A small potted plant that seems to have been abandoned for a while

items.name: Dust Pile
items.description: A massive pile of dust that you somehow manage to hold

rooms.name: MI102c
rooms.description: Another room populated with broken electrical parts. These parts must have been using by the facility before
